English.Text: Hidden in plain sight! Sensing how thorough the inspection is going to be, there is only one possible bolthole for your runaway. "Get in the lifeboat, keep your head down," the crewman whispers, while his pursuers are being detained on some pretence in the captain's cabin. The lifeboat is then winched above the eyeline, where sure enough, they never think to look. Not wanting to cause further trouble, he insists on leaving at the next port.
